Constructor Detail

Mob

public Mob(Level level,
           java.lang.String name,
           int x,
           int y,
           int speed)
Creates a new Mob.

Parameters:
level - the level to add the mob to
name - the name of the mob
x - the x position on the level to add the mob to
y - the y position on the level to add the mob to
speed - the movement speed of the mob

Used when checking for a collision with a blocked tile.
